title: Welcome
cleaned_text: Our Clinic At In Health Naturopathic Medicine, our mission is to promote optimal health & wellness as well as provide excellent and affordable Naturopathic care for the whole family. Meet the Doctor Dr. Crystal Hannan is a licensed naturopathic physician and owner of In Health Naturopathic Medicine. Our Services Treatment focuses on nutrition and lifestyle counseling, as well as the use of botanical medicines, nutritional supplements, and prescription medications if necessary. New Patients Naturopathic physicians can provide you with comprehensive medical care. As a patient of our clinic, we will treat you as the individual that you are and each appointment will be unique. Naturopathic Medicine "A distinct primary health care profession, emphasizing prevention, treatment, and optimal health through the use of therapeutic methods and substances that encourage individuals' inherent self-healing process." We post our latest updates on Facebook including upcoming workshops and office special hours. Follow us and you won't miss out! Sign up for Dr. Hannan's eNewsletter to hear when the next free webinar is offered. Hormones HOT FLASHES, NIGHT SWEATS & MOOD SWINGS OH MY! From time to time we send out newsletter with useful tips, advanced notice of workshops and special offers! Address & Contact Info 4150 Pacific Avenue, Suite 300 Forest Grove, OR.
